title: Rule 14 But Not An Event

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each day is X hours shorter, where X is three times the day number. The Town is not notified of this until it a day ends earlier.
- Whenever a nightfall vote is reached, every following day is three hours shorter.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Speed someone up each night. Every following day will end three hours faster for them. When the day ends for someone specifically, they'll be removed from the day chat and can send in a night action, which will resolve immediately.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cause two days to end early (for everyone).

desc:
Post 1975
*Days and nights last 24 hours each. Days can end early if a majority vote for nightfall is reached; nights can end early if all night actions are sent in.*
